Articles.Content:
Everytime I try to launch the game (through steam or the .exe) it immediately gives the "oops" error prompt, no startscreen, no nothing. Here is my crashlog:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/xob70ycmegokiq4/2014-12-10_131856.rar?dl=0

Welcome to the KSP forums!

Now about your problem, perhaps you have tried re-downloading it? (Simple and very commonly used tactic, but may be effective)

If not, perhaps a mod can help? I'm just a user so...

Good luck!

I know a few things that might work for you as I do not understand the log files, go into the Kerbal Space Program folder and there will be a file called Settings.cfg open it with notepad, change TEXTURE_QUALITY to 1,2 or 3 (try them all) or you could try updating your Graphics Drivers and as a final resort if you do not think there will be any way you can fix it you can factory restore you computer, I recommend only doing this if you really cannot find a solution I don't guruantee it to work either it's just that it worked for me.
Fixed, my grafics drivers where currupted. Thanks for the reply's
